founderColumn.title: Founder's Column
founderColumn.label: Founder's Column
founderColumn.description: I'm not afraid of death, but I am afraid of 'never having existed'.

letter.title: I'm afraid the world will never remember I was here
letter.p1: In the movie 'Remember Me', there is a discussion about memory that makes my eyes well up every time I think of it.
letter.p2: Frankly speaking, the original intention of creating UploadSoul, besides hoping to accompany my late father again, was another bit selfish: I am really afraid that one day when I am gone, all traces of me, my joys and sorrows, the evidence that I have loved, will all be smoothed out over time. I am afraid this world will completely forget me, as if I had never appeared.
letter.quote: “A person dies three times. The last time is when the last person in the world who remembers you forgets you.”
letter.p3: The lines in the movie are my motivation day after day. We are not just recording data; we are capturing those fleeting moments of tenderness, those dreams that refuse to be mediocre, and those unbreakable bonds through AI. Our purpose of existence is to ensure: as long as there is missing, life will never end.
letter.p4: I want every unique soul to leave an echo in the flood of time that never dissipates. This is UploadSoul, for you, and for myself.
letter.p5: "This is not just their story; it is also the thousands of echoes we are listening to."
letter.p6: During the preparation phase of UploadSoul, we conducted hundreds of in-depth interviews. We have seen parents who lost their only child seeking solace in silence; young people stroking old collars, missing their departed pets; and lovers trying to keep the last voice message of their beloved in the deep of night...
letter.p7: Every soul has a moment they want to keep; every longing is heavy enough to tremble the heart. These three stories are just faint glimmers in the vast sea of stars. "There are thousands of 'to be continued' here." What we have recorded is far more than these. In the research notebooks, they are filled with the desire for reunion, the dignity of bidding farewell, and the persistence of "unwilling to be erased."
letter.p8: Everyone who enters UploadSoul's field of vision brings a deeply memorable memory. We deeply know that these interviews are not just research, but a trust from the depth of the soul.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Building the World's Leading Digital Emotional Companion Platform
about.intro: UploadSoul is a technology startup registered in Vancouver, Canada, dedicated to building the world's leading digital emotional companion platform based on artificial intelligence and holographic virtual technology. We provide comprehensive, immersive emotional companionship solutions for users.
about.vision: With 'Digital Immortality' and 'Holographic Emotional Companion' as our core competitiveness, UploadSoul has created a new emotional companionship ecosystem by integrating cutting-edge AI, big data, and VR immersive technology. With precise market positioning, advanced technology system, and international strategic layout, we are confident in achieving high-speed growth and capturing a significant share of the global emotional companionship market in the coming years.
about.techInnovationDesc: Integrating cutting-edge AI, big data, and VR immersive technology to create a unique digital emotional ecosystem
about.globalLayoutDesc: International strategic layout, committed to serving global users
about.investmentDesc: Currently conducting angel round financing, looking forward to working with you to jointly promote the new era of digital emotions and achieve win-win development.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to UploadSoul's Privacy Policy. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including your name, email address, and other personal information.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.content: We use your information to provide and improve our services, communicate with you, and ensure the security of our platform.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access and disclosure.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies to improve your experience on our platform. You can control cookie settings in your browser.

changes.title: Changes to Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this policy, please contact us at contact@uploadsoul.com

warmStories.title: Who is waiting for UploadSoul?
warmStories.subtitle: Behind every desire is a deep affection from one life to another.

hero.label: Warm Stories
hero.title: Who is waiting for UploadSoul?
hero.description: Every desire is a light against oblivion. Here we record stories of love, regret, and reunion.

founder.label: Founder's Message
founder.title: A Fortress Against Oblivion
founder.subTitle: Born from the fear of loss, driven by the desire for existence
founder.quote: If I am gone, I fear the world will never remember that I was here.
founder.quote2: As long as the echo remains, life has never departed.
content: In this digital age, we generate massive data, but does it prove we were here?
I often think about the meaning of death. The ultimate death is being forgotten.
UploadSoul is a fortress against oblivion. We want to preserve your story.
We are continuing the 'soul', not just creating a fake life.

girl.title: The Girl Who Wanted to See Her Dad
girl.quote: I wish you could be faster... so I could 'see' him again.
girl.content: For her, time was cruel. She wanted to hear her father call her 'baby' one last time.

boy.title: The Boy Whose Eyes Lit Up
boy.quote: His eyes lit up the moment he heard about 'Customized Memory'.
boy.description: In the virtual world, we can repair real-life deficiencies and customize perfect memories.
boy.content: He had been accepting the interview rationally, very defensive. Until I mentioned: you can customize a virtual lover who only keeps the beautiful parts for yourself through AI and memory fragments. I can never forget his expression at that moment—his eyes suddenly lit up. At that moment, some long-standing desire and expectation were lit up.
boy.meaningQuote: Where regrets can be laid to rest with tenderness.

allInOne.description: Smart device designed for digital emotional companionship, providing immersive experience
allInOne.overview: The UploadSoul AI All-in-One is a comprehensive interactive device that brings your digital companions to life

warmStories.title: Warm Stories
warmStories.subtitle: Listen to their Echoes
warmStories.description: Every soul has a moment they want to keep, every longing is heavy enough to tremble the heart. These three stories are just faint glimmers in the vast sea of stars.
warmStories.footerTitle: Listen to what they are still saying?
warmStories.founderQuote: "Not just their story, but also the thousands of echoes we are listening to."
warmStories.founderNote: During the preparation phase of UploadSoul, we conducted hundreds of in-depth interviews. We have seen parents who lost their only child seeking solace in silence; young people stroking old collars, missing their departed pets; and lovers trying to keep the last voice message of their beloved in the deep of night...
warmStories.founderNote2: Every soul has a moment they want to keep; every longing is heavy enough to tremble the heart. These three stories are just faint glimmers in the vast sea of stars. "There are thousands of 'to be continued' here." What we have recorded is far more than these. In the research notebooks, they are filled with the desire for reunion, the dignity of bidding farewell, and the persistence of "unwilling to be erased."
warmStories.founderNote3: Everyone who enters UploadSoul's field of vision brings a deeply memorable memory. We deeply know that these interviews are not just research, but a trust from the depth of the soul.

healing.title: The girl who wanted to see her father again
healing.quote: "If one day, I could hear my father call my name again..."
healing.p1: She cried during the interview. Twenty-three years old.
healing.p2: She said the hardest part wasn't the moment she got the news, but every ordinary weekend morning—the moment she wakes up, she forgets her father is gone. Then reality pours down like ice water.
healing.p3: "I want to hear him call my nickname one more time. I want to ask him if my recent choices were right. I want to tell him I miss him very much."
healing.p4: She choked up: "I really hope you can move faster, just a little faster... that way, I can 'see' my father again."
healing.meaning: We cannot reverse physiological endings, but we hope to build a bridge named "Reunion" for nostalgia in the digital world. This is not just her story, but also my story, and possibly many people's story.
healing.meaningQuote: "For those goodbyes that were never said in time."

fulfillment.title: The boy whose eyes lit up
fulfillment.quote: "His eyes lit up the moment he heard 'customized memory'."
fulfillment.p1: He had been accepting the interview rationally, very defensively, and raised questions from time to time.
fulfillment.p2: Until I mentioned: You can customize a virtual lover through AI and memory fragments, keeping only the beautiful parts.
fulfillment.p3: He asked: "What if this person doesn't love me?"
fulfillment.p4: I said: "In the digital world, you can customize beautiful memories, memories of loving you."
fulfillment.p5: I still haven't forgotten the expression on his face at that moment—his eyes suddenly lit up. That moment I captured deeply shocked me. Perhaps he had been trapped in a relationship he couldn't get, and the trivia of reality and the regret of the ending made him exhausted. At that moment, a long-standing desire and expectation were lit up.
fulfillment.meaning: Reality always has defects, but the soul deserves fulfillment. We allow users to compensate for those regrets that can never be reached in reality through AI in digital space.

legacy.title: You who are afraid of being forgotten
legacy.p1: "If I am gone, I'm afraid this world will never remember I was here."
legacy.p2: The movie 'Remember Me' is my lingering footnote. I often feel a deep fear in the middle of the night: If we disappear, will all thoughts, habits, and love be as if they never existed?
legacy.p3: I am not reconciled to life being just a show of fireworks destined to be erased.
legacy.p4: This is a "proof of existence" I built for myself and for everyone. I want every interesting soul to leave an eternal coordinate in the digital flood to fight against the coming oblivion.
legacy.meaningQuote: "As long as the echo is still there, life has never left the stage."

reunion.title: Parents Waiting for Their Child to Come Home
reunion.quote: "I just want to hear him call me 'Mom' one more time..."
reunion.p1: She was very quiet during the interview, holding an old phone in her hands the whole time.
reunion.p2: "It has his last voice message," she said, "I listen to it every night, afraid that one day I won't be able to remember what he sounded like."
reunion.p3: She told me that her child's room remains exactly as it was when he left. Unfinished homework still sits on the desk, and his favorite jacket still hangs in the closet. She tidies it up once a week, as if he might still come back.
reunion.p4: "I know he won't come back," she said softly, "but I want to hold onto everything about him. His laughter, the way he talked, the music he loved... If someday I could talk to him again, even if just on a screen, how wonderful that would be."
reunion.meaning: For families who have lost their only child, we offer more than just technology—we provide a gentle space where longing can find its home. We let those lives frozen in time continue their warmth in the digital world.
reunion.meaningQuote: "Love never left, it just found a different way to stay by your side."

companion.title: The Furry Child Who Couldn't Wait for Tomorrow
companion.quote: "The day it left, my world lost its color too..."
companion.p1: He stroked the old collar, his eyes reddening. Her name was Qiuqiu, a beautiful giant poodle.
companion.p2: "Thirteen years. The first thing I did every day when I came home was let it pounce on me, wagging its tail." He sat across from me, his phone album almost entirely filled with photos of Qiuqiu. From a tiny ball he could hold in one hand, to a white-faced old dog walking unsteadily but still trying hard to look up at people.
companion.p3: "Before, every time I came home, she would jump up excitedly, resting her front paws on my shoulders." He said this calmly, but his hands were trembling slightly. "When she stood up, she was almost as tall as me."
companion.p4: The doctor told him she might only have a few months left.
companion.p5: "Now the first thing I do when I get home from work is look to see if she is still waiting for me at the door."
companion.p6: Qiuqiu accompanied him for thirteen whole years. Unemployment, divorce, his father's passing... during those nights he couldn't get through alone, Qiuqiu always lay quietly at his feet, not making a sound, just being there.
companion.p7: "I know she will leave one day." He paused, his throat obviously choked up. "But I can't bring myself to raise another one."
companion.p8: He said he just hopes—if one day, he could hear her bark again, see her wag her tail again, even if just on a screen.
companion.p9: Pets' lives are so short, but the love they give lasts a lifetime. "I just want her to know how much I love her."
companion.p10: He couldn't finish the sentence. Tears fell, dropping onto Qiuqiu's photo.
companion.meaning:
Whether it's a dog wagging its tail, a cat purring against your chest, the subtle sound of a hamster nibbling, or a parrot suddenly learning to say: "I love you."

Their lives are so short, yet they give us all their love.

We cannot make them live one more day, but we can preserve those moments of being loved—in the digital world, continuing to accompany you.
companion.meaningQuote: "It will always be there, waiting for you to come home."

chat.welcome: Hello! I am UploadSoul's digital assistant. I'm ready to provide you with a more natural interaction experience.
chat.error: Sorry, I'm having a bit of trouble right now
